motds.title: Oro
motds.body: The fallen king is back for revenge, and this time he'll fit right in with the crowd.

motds.title: Fortnitemares
motds.body: Defend against the horde or you’ll find yourself joining Midas’ Shadow army as they swarm the Island and corrupt every poor soul they subdue.

motds.title: Wolverine - Logan
motds.body: Carrying the weight of many wars, Logan has seen it all. Complete the Wolverine Challenges and 60 Weekly Challenges to unlock the Logan Wolverine style.
motds.id: Wolverine - Logan Style Unlock links to challenges

messages.title: Keep Your Account Secure
messages.body: Avoid scam sites offering free V-Bucks. Epic will never ask for your password. Enable Two-Factor Authentication to help stay secure!
